pal 0.0.9051
  • Reference

Test if a directory is an R package

Source: R/pal-GEN.R
is_pkg_dir.Rd

Convenience wrapper around the rprojroot::is_r_package root criterion. Note that it will only return TRUE for the root of a package directory, not its subdirectories.

is_pkg_dir(path = ".")

Arguments

path

The path of the directory to check. A character scalar. Defaults to the current working directory.

Value

TRUE if path is the root directory of an R package, FALSE otherwise.

See also

Other R package functions: assert_pkg(), desc_list(), desc_value(), is_pkg_installed(), is_pkgdown_dir(), ls_pkg(), prose_ls_fn_param()

Examples

is_pkg_dir()

#> [1] FALSE
is_pkg_dir(fs::path_package("pal"))

#> [1] TRUE
